name: Desta: The Memories Between
description:
Fall into the dreamscape. Relive memories, rediscover friends and repair relationships in this turn-based exploration through surreal worlds.

Experience a story of broken relationships, words left unsaid and the chance to explore your dreams for answers in this character-driven roguelite!

Features:

• Play a surreal ball game: Make trick shots, land hits and perfect throws in turn-based sports-style encounters. As nights progress, Desta will become more experienced and attuned to this surreal world, discovering new abilities and ways to win.

• Explore unfolding dreams: Every night, Desta falls into the mysterious dreamworld, filled with shattered remnants of locations past, memories of regret-filled relationships, and powerful orbs that can change the course of conversation.

• Meet powerful characters: Follow Desta as they meet all sorts of strange and interesting characters with exceptional abilities, each with their own story to tell about their connection to this world.

• All players welcome: From beginning to end, this game is designed so players of all skill levels can experience the full journey.

This game contains themes of self-reflection, anxiety, mental health, loss of parental figures and gender identity. Player discretion is advised.

- From ustwo games.
